column2: About this role:           Wells Fargo is seeking a Senior Infrastructure Engineer.     Department Overview     The Chief Technology Officer (CTO) group is responsible for Agile, Architecture, Services, Product Development and Cloud, Engineering, and Tools, Site Reliability, as well as training and processes to enable the Wells Fargo Technology organization and the company to achieve this transformation.   The SES Product Owner team is responsible for managing 2,000 Commercial Off the Shelf Software titles aligned to Application Products in Technology Standards Center, each Product Owners is dedicated to focus on product knowledge and management which is critical to reduce operational risks and ensure key deliverables supporting the EPIC Strategies.     About the Role:      Responsible and accountable for the management of an existing software product portfolio of 180 active products and 200 approved products. Responsibilities include CMP, Currency, and Security Baseline management of their assigned products through full product lifecycle, product sunrise, and product removal activities. The responsibilities of the Systems Operations Engineer are critical to effectively managing each product to reduce operational risks and ensure key deliverables supporting the 6S Strategies.     Responsibilities:   6+ years of experience in product management at an agile   Progressive experience working with a deep know-how of both the technical and business aspects of managing a large (300+) product portfolio   Experience implementing or expanding product-driven, agile methodologies with domain expertise in a Banking/Financial organization a plus   Strong knowledge of Microsoft Office products   Setting and driving product strategy and roadmaps aligned to vendor or category strategies across a large portfolio of products to manage Product Roadmaps, Baseline Standards, and Configuration Profiles   Strengthen current relationships and establish integrations with future partners.   Strong technical background, good business sense, and an ability to partner closely with engineering, other product management leaders, architecture, business unit leads, application development leads and internal operations teams.   Understand core business problems and requirements from internal stakeholders and LOB leaders.   Provide leadership in a prioritization of product strategy and lifecycle management.   Provide automation strategy for product management and testing of 3rd party products using variety of frameworks.    Self-motivated and able to apply agile product management and continuous improvement strategies   Strong product management skills and ability to effectively manage product portfolio of diverse products from multiple vendors across multiple product categories   Excellent critical thinking, interpersonal, verbal, and written communication skills   Deliver data-driven results, analysis, and application of findings   Strong communication and presentation skills with history of clients and other stakeholders as audience   Strong prioritization and project management skills, including timely communication of timelines, status, and critical issues   A strong voice for best practices, enterprise policies, and industry standards   Essential Qualification   B.SC/B.COM Graduate or BTech Graduate with 8+ years of experience in IT industry.   8+ year s technical experience in systems administration or networking   Experience implementing or expanding product-driven, agile methodologies with domain expertise in a Banking/Financial organization a plus   Experience in working on CMP, Currency, and Security Baseline management of their assigned products through full product lifecycle, product sunrise, and product removal activities   Expertise in Setting and driving product strategy and roadmaps aligned to vendor or category strategies across a large portfolio of products to manage Product Roadmaps, Baseline Standards, and Configuration Profiles   Experience in Managing software product portfolio    Experience in managing each product to reduce operational risks and ensure key deliverables supporting the 6S Strategies.   Collaborate with various WF organizations on all manner of security and compliance related business matters   Meet regularly with support and development teams to gather feedback and requirements   Develop Scripting solutions to improve process effectiveness.   Research, define solutions, and provide remediation instructions for vulnerable products   Understanding of software product functionality on servers and desktops (such as Microsoft, Oracle, Adobe, Apache, IBM, etc.)   Preferred experience with scripting languages (such as PowerShell, Python, VB scripts, etc.)   Advanced Microsoft Office skills (excel spreadsheets, VBA, pivot tables, vlookup, etc.,)   Knowledge and understanding of Linux operating systems.   Knowledge and understanding of Windows server operating systems.   Ability to execute in a fast paced, high demand environment while balancing multiple priorities.   Ability to communicate effectively, in both written and verbal formats.   Strong analytical and technical skills.   Ability to work effectively, as well as independently, in a team environment.   Flexibility to work evenings and weekends as needed.     Desired Skill    Good understanding of software product functionality on servers and desktops (i.e. Microsoft, Oracle, Adobe, Apache, IBM, etc.)   knowledge in Windows Operating System or Linux operating systems.   Demonstrated ability to use Microsoft Excel, Word, Ability to dissect technical problems, analyze data, and recommend potential solutions   Ability to assess issues, make quick decisions, implement solutions, and influence change   Ability to think outside the box and operate independently with little direction   knowledge with Windows and Linux server operating systems

column1: Urgent opening || AWS Administrator || Insight Enterprises, Inc
column2: Responsibilities  Cloud Migration      Planning: Collaborate with clients and internal teams to assess their      existing infrastructure and applications, understanding their business      needs and technical requirements. Develop detailed migration plans and      timelines to move applications and data to the AWS cloud while minimizing      downtime and disruptions.  AWS Service Selection:      Utilize your in-depth knowledge of AWS services to recommend the most      appropriate solutions for each migration project. Consider factors such as      application architecture, data storage, security, and scalability while      choosing the right AWS services.  Environment Setup and      Configuration: Set up and configure AWS environments to support the      migration process. This includes creating virtual private clouds (VPCs),      network configurations, security groups, and other necessary components.  Data Migration: Design      and execute data migration strategies, ensuring the integrity and security      of the data during the transfer. Implement best practices for data      migration and validation to guarantee a successful migration.  Application Migration:      Manage the migration of various applications, databases, and workloads to      AWS. Address any compatibility issues and ensure that applications      function optimally in the cloud environment.  Automation and      Scripting: Leverage automation and scripting tools (e.g., AWS      CloudFormation, AWS CLI, etc.) to streamline migration processes and      reduce manual intervention wherever possible.  Security and Compliance:      Implement robust security measures and compliance practices during the      migration process. Ensure that all migrated resources adhere to industry      standards and best practices for security.  Performance      Optimization: Fine-tune AWS resources to optimize performance and      cost-efficiency, utilizing auto-scaling, load balancing, and other AWS      features as needed.  Troubleshooting and      Support: Provide technical support during and after migration, addressing      any issues that arise and resolving them in a timely manner.  Documentation and      Reporting: Create comprehensive documentation for migration projects,      including architectural diagrams, process flows, and post-migration      reports. Present project status and results to internal and external      stakeholders.  Cost Optimization:      Identify opportunities to optimize cloud costs for clients during the      migration process. Utilize AWS Cost Management tools to analyze and      recommend cost-effective solutions without compromising performance or      security.  Disaster Recovery      Planning: Develop disaster recovery strategies for migrated applications      and data, ensuring business continuity and data resilience in the AWS      cloud.  Continuous      Monitoring: Implement monitoring and alerting solutions to proactively      identify performance issues or potential security breaches, providing      quick response and resolution.  Cloud Optimization      Strategies: Propose and implement optimization strategies for existing AWS      environments, improving performance, reliability, and cost-effectiveness.  Risk Management:      Identify potential risks associated with cloud migrations and develop      mitigation plans to address them effectively.  Required Skills  Bachelors degree in      computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.  5-9 years of      professional experience in cloud computing, specifically with AWS      services.  AWS Infra Server and Application Migration, Database      Migration Landing zone Setup, On-premises Migration Cloud Designing  Architectural, AWS services      including EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, VPC. Automation ??Terraform or PowerShell, AWS Cloud      Formation. Candidate must have exposure with Client handling      and other clouds; Azure or GCP.
column11: Application Migration, Amazon Ec2, Vpc, Database Migration, Rds Postgresql, Lambda Aws

column2: Job Description:  We are seeking a talented and experienced .NET Full Stack Developer with expertise in React.js to join our development team. column2: Job Description: The  Oracle Database Administrator  is responsible for all aspects of Insights database administration and production support. This responsibility includes database configuration, maintenance, production support, troubleshooting, and capacity planning, and assists in the daily maintenance and administration of Oracle and MS SQL and related production activities within Insight.  Mandatory Skills: Oracle DBA, Certified Database Administrator, Structured Query Language, MS SQL Server, Oracle Server.   Location: Delhi NCR, Hyderabad, Bangalore, Pune Shift Hours: 7 PM- 4 AM IST (US shift)  What you will do at Insight Production Support - 40% Review logs for errors and correct any issues discovered. Review backup jobs and correct any issues found. Rerun jobs or other queries as requested. Perform routine maintenance tasks. Monitor database systems operation and correct any issues discovered. Development support - 30% Query analysis. Provide assistance in SQL statement tuning. Capacity planning, system landscape development / installation - 10% Code promotion and implementation activities - 10%. Misc. Tasks - 10%   Main Functions Monitor error log(s), database and log space, user activity and resource utilization of production environment.  Work with application programmers to ensure that application problems do not adversely affect production operations. Monitor system resources of database servers to assure production systems meet availability requirements and hardware enhancements are scheduled in a timely fashion. Responsible for auditing and integrity of the data Create, maintain and refresh required Oracle instances/databases for development, test, and production environments. Provide end users with technical data in a clear and meaningful manner. Provide current and historical information and analysis. Establish and manage user access, and design and implement user environments. Work with development team to identify new technologies and manage the implementation through all levels of the system landscape. Ability to interact with end users to identify and resolve production issues related to their usage of the system. Mentor and train other database administrators, developers and other Insight personnel project-related. This position participates in the on-call rotation to support systems after hours and on weekends     Requirements and skills Bachelor's degree (B. A.) from four-year College or university; or equivalent combination of education and experience.  4 years of experience working with Oracle or MS SQL databases in a corporate environment. Completion of one of the following: Microsoft Certified Database Administrator or Oracle Database Administrator Certified Associate / Professional. Strong knowledge writing Structured Query Language  Strong understanding of business rules for key business functions Good technical aptitude Understand relational databases (MS SQL Server, Oracle) Ability to analyze and tune SQL statements. Ability to use common tools to monitor and analyze database operations. Ability to troubleshoot at the component level.

column2: About Insight: Founded in 1988, Insight is headquartered in  Chandler, Arizona, USA  and has more and has more than  13000+ Teammates  worldwide with global presence in Canada, United Kingdom, Germany, Australia, India, Singapore and many more. With offices in the prime location -Gurgaon and Bangalore we have 1000+ teammates operating from India. As a Fortune 500-ranked global provider of Digital Innovation, Cloud Data Center Transformation and Supply Chain Optimization solutions and services, we help clients successfully manage their IT today while transforming for tomorrow, recognized for its excellence.     About the team Looking for specialization in migrations, will play a key role in designing, planning, and executing seamless cloud migrations for our clients. You will be responsible for understanding our clients' existing on-premises infrastructure, applications, and data, and developing comprehensive migration strategies to AWS cloud services. Your expertise will ensure a smooth transition to the cloud, optimizing performance, reliability, and cost efficiency for our clients' applications and workloads. Responsibilities    Knowledge and hands-on experience with AWS services such as AWS EC2, S3, SNS, EBS, ELB, EFS, Route 53, VPC, IAM, CloudWatch, CloudFront, Lambda, CloudTrail, and RDS. Additionally, familiarity with AWS backup services and monitoring services.  Develop and implement automation scripts and solutions using tools like Terraform, CloudFormation templates, and bash scripting.  Implement and manage DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines using tools such as Jenkins, GitHub, Docker, EKS, and ECR to automate software delivery and deployment processes. Cloud Migration Planning: Collaborate with clients and internal teams to assess their existing infrastructure and applications, understanding their business needs and technical requirements. Develop detailed migration plans and timelines to move applications and data to the AWS cloud while minimizing downtime and disruptions. Environment Setup and Configuration: Set up and configure AWS environments to support the migration process. This includes creating virtual private clouds (VPCs), network configurations, security groups, and other necessary components. Data Migration: Design and execute data migration strategies, ensuring the integrity and security of the data during the transfer. Implement best practices for data migration and validation to guarantee a successful migration. Application Migration: Manage the migration of various applications, databases, and workloads to AWS. Address any compatibility issues and ensure that applications function optimally in the cloud environment. Automation and Scripting: Leverage automation and scripting tools (e.g., AWS CloudFormation, AWS CLI, etc.) to streamline migration processes and reduce manual intervention wherever possible. Security and Compliance: Implement robust security measures and compliance practices during the migration process. Ensure that all migrated resources adhere to industry standards and best practices for security. Performance Optimization: Fine-tune AWS resources to optimize performance and cost-efficiency, utilizing auto-scaling, load balancing, and other AWS features as needed. Troubleshooting and Support: Provide technical support during and after migration, addressing any issues that arise and resolving them in a timely manner. Documentation and Reporting: Create comprehensive documentation for migration projects, including architectural diagrams, process flows, and post-migration reports. Present project status and results to internal and external stakeholders. Cost Optimization: Identify opportunities to optimize cloud costs for clients during the migration process. Utilize AWS Cost Management tools to analyze and recommend cost-effective solutions without compromising performance or security. Disaster Recovery Planning: Develop disaster recovery strategies for migrated applications and data, ensuring business continuity and data resilience in the AWS cloud. Continuous Monitoring: Implement monitoring and alerting solutions to proactively identify performance issues or potential security breaches, providing quick response and resolution.  Cloud Optimization Strategies: Propose and implement optimization strategies for existing AWS environments, improving performance, reliability, and cost-effectiveness. Risk Management: Identify potential risks associated with cloud migrations and develop mitigation plans to address them effectively. Qualification: bachelor?? degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field. 5-8 years of professional experience in cloud computing, specifically with AWS services. Proven experience in planning and executing successful cloud migration projects. Strong knowledge of AWS services, including EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, VPC, etc. Solid understanding of networking concepts and security best practices in AWS. Proficiency in automation and scripting using tools like AWS CloudFormation, AWS CLI, Python, or PowerShell. Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills. AWS certifications, such as AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate, are a plus. Strong communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with clients and cross-functional teams. Join our team of talented professionals and make a significant impact on the cloud migration journey of our clients. Apply now and be a part of our exciting and forward-thinking organization! Insight is an equal opportunity employer, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, sexual orientation or any other characteristic protected by law. Today's talent leads to tomorrow's success.  Learn about careers at Insight: https://www.insight.com/en_US/careers/india.html

column2: Role   Infra Automation Analyst Technology   UI Development (ReactJS & Streamlit)   Job Description   Today, the corporate landscape is dynamic and the world ahead is full of possibilities! None of the amazing things we do at Infosys would be possible without an equally amazing culture, the environment where ideas can flourish and where you are empowered to move forward as far as your ideas will take you.   At Infosys, we assure that your career will never stand still, we will inspire you to build whats next and we will navigate further together. Our journey of learnability, values and trusted relationships with our clients continue to be the cornerstones of our organization and these values are upheld only because of our people.   Your role As an Infra Automation Analyst you will work on UI development for Gen AI Applications developed through Python   Required   Good Communication skills Good analytical and problem-solving skills Good Experience in UI development through  ReactJS Good Experience in  Streamlist  Opensource Python framework Good Experience working on  Python   Good Experience in  JavaScript Knowledge of basic algorithms and object-oriented and functional design principles Knowledge of data structures, data modeling, and software architecture Knowledge of Mathematics, Probability, Statistics and Algorithms Knowledge on Gen AI   Role Description   Should have worked in the following areas in UI development.   Designing user interfaces: A UI developer is responsible for creating user interfaces that are visually appealing, easy to use, and intuitive. Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code using front-end web development through ReactJS Implementing designs: These professionals also work closely with the design team to implement the designs into the final product to ensure the design is accurately translated into a functional interface. Creating and testing prototypes: Before implementing a specific user interface, prototype creation is a crucial step that helps identify any glitches, shortcomings, or loopholes. UI developers create prototypes of the user interface and test them with users to ensure that the design meets the requirements of the end users. Further, they check if the user interface is compatible with different browsers and devices. Optimizing performance: UI developers also ensure the interface runs smoothly. Therefore, they optimize the user interface to ensure that it loads quickly and performs efficiently. They also test the user interface to ensure that it works as expected and is free of bugs.   Personal   Besides the professional qualifications of the candidates, we place great importance in addition to various forms personality profile. These include: High analytical skills A high degree of initiative and flexibility High customer orientation High quality awareness Excellent verbal and written communication skills   If you wish to apply through career site, please click the link below. https://career.infosys.com/jobdesc?jobReferenceCode=INFSYS-EXTERNAL-181163 About Infosys Infosys is a global leader in next-generation digital services and consulting. We enable clients in 46 countries to navigate their digital transformation. With over three decades of experience in managing the systems and workings of global enterprises, we expertly steer our clients through the many next of their digital journey. We do it by enabling the enterprise with an AI-powered core that helps prioritize the execution of change. We also empower the business with agile digital at scale to deliver unprecedented levels of performance and customer delight. Our always-on learning agenda drives their continuous improvement through building and transferring digital skills, expertise and ideas from our innovation ecosystem. Visit www.infosys.com to see how Infosys can help your enterprise navigate your next. A day in the life of an Infoscion As part of the Infosys delivery team, your primary role would be to ensure effective Design, Development, Validation and Support activities, to assure that our clients are satisfied with the high levels of service in the technology domain. You will gather the requirements and specifications to understand the client requirements in a detailed manner and translate the same into system requirements. You will play a key role in the overall estimation of work requirements to provide the right information on project estimations to Technology Leads and Project Managers. You would be a key contributor to building efficient programs/ systems and if you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you! If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you! All aspects of employment at Infosys are based on merit, competence and performance. We are committed to embracing diversity and creating an inclusive environment for all employees. Infosys is proud to be an equal opportunity employer

column2: About this role:           Wells Fargo is seeking a Senior Library Engineer to help manage, operate and improve the Software Library, the centralized repository storing all approved third party assets.     This role will be responsible for capturing and importing new components and other relevant information about those components, verifying component integrity, and implementing changes in collaboration with other members of the team.     The successful candidate will also refine and document processes and procedures and contributed to the continued enhancement and development of this capability within Wells Fargo using an array of technical and process focused skills. They will be capable of handling multiple, concurrent requests with precision, care and customer focus, be capable of working quickly, aided by a broad array of skills and support a culture of continuous application improvements to process automation and release engineering.           In this role, you will:       Research vendor websites to obtain a complete component     Download and import software to several different repositories depending on the needs.     Communicates status and escalate complex issues     Continuously seek process and automation enhancements to further streamline the work.     Stay abreast of emerging market and industry opportunities in the tools space. Provides feedback and review regarding these opportunities to management     Recommend courses of action to maintain cost effectiveness and achieve results     Collaborate and consult with peers, colleagues and managers to resolve issues and achieve goals           Required Qualifications, :       4+ years of Technology Infrastructure Engineering and Solutions experience, or equivalent demonstrated through one or a combination of the following: work experience, training, military experience, education     3+ years customer service experience     1+ years of experience with software asset management practices     1+ years of experience with source/version control tools     1+ years of Red Hat command line interface experience     1+ years of experience with issue tracking tools (Jira, ServiceNow, Bugzilla)           Desired Qualifications:       1+ years Subversion experience     Knowledge and understanding of technology risks related to business risks     Knowledge and understanding of technology software: packaging, distribution, and troubleshooting     Knowledge and understanding of DevOps principles     Experience with testing techniques such as regression testing, ad hoc testing, feature testing, security testing, user interface testing, integration testing, performance testing.           Job Expectations:       Willingness to work on-site at stated location on the job opening     Ability to provide and work from a home office     We Value Diversity     At Wells Fargo, we believe in diversity, equity and inclusion in the workplace; accordingly, we welcome applications for employment from all qualified candidates, regardless of race, color, gender, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, genetic information, individuals with disabilities, pregnancy, marital status, status as a protected veteran or any other status protected by applicable law.     Employees support our focus on building strong customer relationships balanced with a strong risk mitigating and compliance-driven culture which firmly establishes those disciplines as critical to the success of our customers and company. They are accountable for execution of all applicable risk programs (Credit, Market, Financial Crimes, Operational, Regulatory Compliance), which includes effectively following and adhering to applicable Wells Fargo policies and procedures, appropriately fulfilling risk and compliance obligations, timely and effective escalation and remediation of issues, and making sound risk decisions. There is emphasis on proactive monitoring, governance, risk identification and escalation, as well as making sound risk decisions commensurate with the business unit s risk appetite and all risk and compliance program requirements.

column2: Role   Infra Automation Consultant Technology   Python, Gen AI & Rest API   Job Description Today, the corporate landscape is dynamic and the world ahead is full of possibilities! None of the amazing things we do at Infosys would be possible without an equally amazing culture, the environment where ideas can flourish and where you are empowered to move forward as far as your ideas will take you.   At Infosys, we assure that your career will never stand still, we will inspire you to build whats next and we will navigate further together. Our journey of learnability, values and trusted relationships with our clients continue to be the cornerstones of our organization and these values are upheld only because of our people.   Your role As an Infra Automation Consultant you will work on Infrastructure Automation in Python platform   Required   Good Communication skills Good analytical and problem-solving skills At least 6+ years of programming experience in  Python Good  Gen AI  experience Experience in  REST API   Knowledge of basic algorithms and object-oriented and functional design principles Knowledge of data structures, data modeling, and software architecture Knowledge of Mathematics, Probability, Statistics, and Algorithms   Preferred    Good  AI/ML  knowledge Good  Data Science  knowledge   Role Description   Should have worked in the following areas in  Python :   Analyzing project requirements. Creating and implementing test scripts. Analyzing test results. Collecting test requirements. Developing strategies for the implementation of tests. Test planning. Preparing reports and documentation. Integrating automation tools. Tasks like data extraction, data manipulation, data transformation, and report generation to be automated using Python Web Scraping and Data Extraction Web scraping can be used to gather information, monitor websites for updates, or collect data for analysis. Testing and Quality Assurance: Python's testing frameworks, such as PyTest and unit test, facilitate the automation of testing processes. Should have worked in the following areas in  Gen AI : Experience with building AI and machine learning solutions, Machine Learning Operation frameworks such as Kubeflow, and leveraging specific machine learning architectures (e.g., deep learning, LSTM, etc.) Experience working in Gen AI Framework like Langchain Experience working in Gen AI Open source platform like TensorFlow, Keras and PyTorch Understanding of AI Models, Large Language Models, and AI specialized infrastructure especially as it relates to AI trends and issues within businesses. Understanding of responsible AI practice. Provide AI expertise to support the technical relationship with customers, including product and solution briefings, proof-of-concept work.  Recommend integration strategies, enterprise architectures, platforms, and application infrastructure required to implement a complete solution using Gen AI best practices.  Support developers, creators, and enterprises to leverage Generative Language APIs so they can build their own AI products in the future. Work with the team to identify and qualify business opportunities, understand key customer technical objections, and develop the strategy to resolve technical blockers. Strategize surrounding solution code development in collaboration with internal or external developers, users, partners, clients, or stakeholders as needed. Build APIs that cater to the diverse need of customers through REST API   Personal Besides the professional qualifications of the candidates, we place great importance in addition to various forms personality profile. These include: High analytical skills A high degree of initiative and flexibility High customer orientation High quality awareness Excellent verbal and written communication skills   If you wish to apply through career site, please click the link below.   https://career.infosys.com/jobdesc?jobReferenceCode=INFSYS-EXTERNAL-181163   About Infosys Infosys is a global leader in next-generation digital services and consulting. We enable clients in 46 countries to navigate their digital transformation. With over three decades of experience in managing the systems and workings of global enterprises, we expertly steer our clients through the many next of their digital journey. We do it by enabling the enterprise with an AI-powered core that helps prioritize the execution of change. We also empower the business with agile digital at scale to deliver unprecedented levels of performance and customer delight. Our always-on learning agenda drives their continuous improvement through building and transferring digital skills, expertise and ideas from our innovation ecosystem. Visit www.infosys.com to see how Infosys can help your enterprise navigate your next. A day in the life of an Infoscion As part of the Infosys delivery team, your primary role would be to ensure effective Design, Development, Validation and Support activities, to assure that our clients are satisfied with the high levels of service in the technology domain. You will gather the requirements and specifications to understand the client requirements in a detailed manner and translate the same into system requirements. You will play a key role in the overall estimation of work requirements to provide the right information on project estimations to Technology Leads and Project Managers. You would be a key contributor to building efficient programs/ systems and if you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you! If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you! All aspects of employment at Infosys are based on merit, competence and performance. We are committed to embracing diversity and creating an inclusive environment for all employees. Infosys is proud to be an equal opportunity employer

column2: Senior Infrastructure Automation Engineer is responsible for the design and development of automation solutions for the IT Infrastructure team. The Senior Automation Engineer will work closely with the Infrastructure Operations Team to understand the business requirements and develop automation solutions to meet those requirements. The Senior Automation Engineer will be expected to be able to work independently and collaboratively to develop automation scripts, implement automation tools, and maintain automation systems. Essential Functions     Design and develop automation solutions using scripting languages such as PowerShell, Python, Bash, Terraform and ServiceNow. Collaborate with infrastructure operations teams to identify and prioritize areas (events, incidents, processes) to deploy remediation, assisted, diagnostic and RPA automation.   Scripting and working with APIs For example, tasks could include automating app secret rotations in Azure or streamlining warranty renewal processes for servers using available Dell APIs primarily using PowerShell & Python.     Debug, maintain and troubleshoot automation issues, identify root cause and implement solutions.     Participate in managing day-to-day operations of cloud infrastructure environments, including performance management, monitoring, and assessment of metrics. Handson for Deployments, Templates, Networking, Config, upgrades, App Gateway services, API, CI/CD Pipelines     Work with business units on new deployments, issues, and improvements to existing services: assist development teams with integrations and identity enablement for SaaS or custom products; deploy IaaS and PaaS infrastructure in AWS, Azure, or GCP using Terraform, Ansible, or another Infrastructure-as-Code tooling.   L1/L2 support for:    Cloud | VMware | Nutanix | VxRail | DC Operations   Server Life Cycle Management (Build/QA/Decomm)   VDI/AVD Support (Citrix/Azure AVD)   Infrastructure Cleanup (On Prem, Cloud)   Backup, Storage and DR Ops (Veeam, Druva, ASR, Zerto, Rubrik)   Windows, Linux Patching for On Prem, Cloud, CloudLaunch (Tanium)   Event/Incident Management (DataDog, ServiceNow)   App Secret/Cert Management (Azure, IIS)   Refresh/Upgrades (OS, Firmware, Drivers, HyperVs)     Thanks & Regards, ?Umamaheswari? ?HR Manager- Client Services ?DSJ Infotech-Coimbatore

column2: We are seeking a passionate and capable candidate with EDI experience of 8+ years and a proven ability to effectively develop and manage relationships between the organization and its clients.  Skills Required: Capable of transforming an existing business into a more efficient digital enterprise by implementing cost-effective and durable EDI/B2b solutions for themselves and their customers to enhance trade capabilities. Having a track record of quickly understanding the requirements and then communicating sustainable technical solutions to clients. Enjoying challenging and open-ended discussions for collaborative deliverables. In-depth knowledge and hands-on exposure on end-to-end EDI ERP integrations/implementations, EDI project management (support & development), and EDI business analysis. Expertise in EDI Transactions like Order, Order Response, Invoice, and Advance Shipment Notice using EDI Standard formats like ANSI X12, EDIFACT, IDOC, Mainframe Application Data, UBL, XML, JSON, and CSV with communication protocols like AS2, HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, SFTP, and RNIF for implementation. Requirement analysis for the project scope and proposal estimation for the rollout. Project planning (work and timelines), task distribution to the internal team, and coordination with the partners. Roles and responsibilities: As an EDI specialist, you will perform EDI analysis, research, and documentation of transactional set data requests and issues from internal and external sources. Developed Use cases, Activity Diagrams, and Sequence Diagrams Implement EDI maps in X12 and XML Planning and executing phases of the software life cycle, starting with requirement study, analysis, development, and production support Experience with Scrum and different scrum meetings like sprint planning meetings, and daily stand-up meetings.

column2: JOB DESCRIPTION Designation : System & Storage Administrator, IT Job Location : Bangalore Reporting to : Deputy Manager, IT Job Grade : 8-II The Company Syngene International Ltd. (BSE: 539268, NSE: SYNGENE, ISIN: INE398R01022), is an integrated research, development, and manufacturing solutions company serving the global pharmaceutical, biotechnology, nutrition, animal health, consumer goods, and specialty chemical sectors. Syngene 4500+ scientists offer both the skills and capacity to deliver great science, robust data management and IP security, and quality manufacturing at speed, to improve time-to-market and lower the cost of innovation. With a combination of 1.9 Mn sq ft of specialist discovery, development, and manufacturing facilities, as well as dedicated research facilities for Amgen, Baxter, Bristol-Myers Squibb and Herbalife, Syngene works with biotech companies pursuing leading edge science as well as multinationals including GSK and Merck KGaA. The Role  Manage      IT systems for all Public, Hybrid Cloud hosted applications. Monitor server performance, ensuring optimal resource      utilization. Implement corrective actions and process improvements based on analysis      findings. Develop and implement backup and recovery strategies to      protect critical data and ensure business continuity. Provide      end to end technical support and problem resolution. . Location :- Bangalore Shifts:- 24/7 - Rotational shifts Experience:- 3.5 to 5 yrs   Job Description: for SIEM [  Senior Administrator - SIEM || P2B ] Skills- SOC-SIEM- Sentinel/Splunk Security Event Monitoring (SIEM) 1) Perform detailed security event analysis. 2) Develop Correlation Rules on SIEM. Create, modify and tune the SIEM rules to adjust the specifications of alerts and incidents. 3) Perform device integration with Security Event Monitoring (SIEM). 4) Develop reports from SIEM for compliance requirements. 5) Monitor Correlated Security Event and perform investigation along with respective team. 6) Troubleshoot with other support group on the systems that are not logging into the SIEM. column2: Welcome to Warner Bros. Discovery the stuff dreams are made of. Who We Are  When we say, the stuff dreams are made of, were not just referring to the world of wizards, dragons and superheroes, or even to the wonders of Planet Earth. Behind WBDs vast portfolio of iconic content and beloved brands, are the  storytellers  bringing our characters to life, the  creators  bringing them to your living rooms and the  dreamers  creating whats next From brilliant creatives, to technology trailblazers, across the globe, WBD offers career defining opportunities, thoughtfully curated benefits, and the tools to explore and grow into your best selves. Here you are supported, here you are celebrated, here you can thrive. The Job This role is for a Sr. Manager of Infrastructure Engineering, part of the Global Infrastructure Core Technologies (GICT) Team. This role is a strategic leader for our infrastructure team as it pertains to compute and storage on behalf of all WBD brands. This includes new & existing infrastructure deployments, migrations, support, and maintenance. This individual will be exposed to a variety of Linux, Windows, VMWare virtualization and storage technologies running both on-premises and in the cloud. You will manage the daily operations in the department responsible for the planning, implementation, integration, and support of the organizations systems infrastructure. You will ensure that hardware and software are implemented utilizing best practices and in a manner that meets the needs of the organization. The Global Infrastructure Core Technologies team is building technology and systems that meet world class standards for which Warner Bros. Discovery is known. We provide 24X7 engineering and tier 3 support for various stakeholders globally. You will be responsible for building and maintaining a world class team based out of Hyderabad, India which will be responsible for managing all aspects of infrastructure engineering. You will provide leadership, coaching, guidance, training, and support to provide an optimal position for success. This position requires a background in leading and/or managing compute and storage focused teams. Proficiency in Ansible or Chef for Automation is a plus, as well as Jenkins. The Sr. Manager is responsible for developing and sustaining an efficient and effective infrastructure team, overseeing highly available infrastructure in data centers and colocations around the world. Spoken and written English is required. The Daily Major Activities  Operational Responsibilities Manages physical, virtual, and cloud-based compute and storage infrastructure for extending to colocations and data centers & various disaster recovery as needed. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and objectives. Assign tasks and responsibilities to team members. Perform data analysis to identify areas for improvement and optimization. Provide hands-on management of our systems, while participating in and managing on-call rotation. You will lead all troubleshooting efforts for outages and impairments within our technical footprint. Leads the selection and implementation of configuration management tools, deployment automation, and orchestration tools. Devises the strategy and implementation approach to system monitoring and log management. Work to develop a comprehensive backup and disaster recovery plans. Manage stakeholder communications and escalations during projects and production incidents. Lead, train, and mentor the infrastructure team, setting goals and managing to KPIs Maintain the operational stability of the physical and virtual infrastructure by providing primary support for all dependent organizations; possesses commitment toward break/fix Prioritize, drive, and validate strategies and roadmaps for platforms, and technologies. Project Responsibilities Collaborate with all business and technical stakeholders & Project Management team providing advice and assistance to coordinate and operationalize the integrated strategic and operational plans for innovative technologies, methodologies, and processes. Participate in developing Strategic Roadmap for the advancement of Next Generation Infrastructure technologies, and processes for ongoing projects & improvements. Act as a mentor for other team members when troubleshooting infrastructure, middleware, and related applications. Lead group-brainstorming sessions with infrastructure teams. Build and develop a world class infrastructure team in Hyderabad, India Communication Keep Infrastructure Engineering teams and other teams updated on changes to architecture and infrastructure standards and tooling. Keep operations and project teams well informed of changes regarding status of assigned tasks. Create and deliver presentations to stakeholders, engineering teams, and to senior leadership as needed. Communicate with business stakeholders regarding maintenance, incidents, and projects. Attend online meetings with teams in the U.S. as needed. The Essentials Work Experience Minimum of 12-15 years of experience working in technology, with increasing levels of responsibility. Minimum 5 years of demonstrated management or leadership experience. Bachelors degree in computer science, computer engineering, information technology, or a related field (or equivalent experience) is required. Demonstrated experience establishing automation-first teams and systems. 5+ years of professional experience with Systems, Storage, and Virtualization technologies. Strong knowledge of automation methodologies, scripting languages, and tooling. Solid familiarity with systems engineering, operating systems, storage concepts, virtualization technologies, and security. Minimum 3 years working experience in public cloud environments, particularly Amazon AWS or Microsoft Azure. Knowledge/Skills & Competencies Strong skillset in leading compute and storage focused engineering teams Self-learner, independent, with outstanding problem-solving skills. Understanding of AWS or Azure cloud methodologies Superior organizational skills with a high degree of flexibility, attention to detail, and ability to adapt to changing priorities, timelines, and deadlines. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Ability to manage time and prioritize effectively. Possess mastery level understanding of various server hardware, operating systems, and backend storage technologies; including converged systems, backup/recovery software, and monitoring toolsets to name a few. Familiarity of Windows Server 2016/2019/2022, RHEL8/9, VMWare ESXi, vCenter, Aria Automation is preferred. Familiarity of block and file-based storage technologies such as Hitachi, NetApp, Pure storage, and fibre-channel switching technologies is preferred. Ability to provide continued training, development, leadership and support to engineers for designing and deploying modern solutions.
column11: Infrastructure engineering, esxi, project management, data analysis, linux, jenkins, aws, ansible

column2: The primary responsibilities for this role will be administering and maintaining our Atlassian suite of products, closely working with key stakeholders in Support, Operations and Engineering.  You will be responsible for gathering requirements, architecting and implementing our transition to JIRA Service Management. Subsequently being responsible for all further improvements and developments across JIRA, Confluence and JSM . Role & responsibilities     Plan and co-ordinate full migration from current CSM applications to JIRA Service Management Gather requirements and inputs needed to determine clearly defined JIRA workflows, architecture and automation Gather requirements and inputs needed to construct JIRA dashboards and reports for high-level snapshots of progress and status, to be used by Engineering, Product, Support & Operations Analyze, review, and document current      functionality to determine potential areas of improvement Configure      JIRA and JIRA Service Management to specified requirements for Support, Operations,      Engineering and management teams, including service portals and knowledge      bases Administer and maintain JIRA      environments post-implementation; suggest and implement  optimizations      based on user behavior Investigate issues with notifications, workflow, permissions etc. Perform system and application management activities, such as      scheduling jobs, backing up data, recurring maintenance actions Assess, set up, and maintain third-party connections, integrations,      and applications, including using webhooks and APIs and testing new      versions of the tools and plug-ins to verify compatibility Improve JIRA security. Manage access permissions for projects,      spaces and tools according to the needs of projects and teams Create standardized templates for functional requirements documents, technical architecture  documentation, and user stories Assist with development of training documentation that can be used to roll out JIRA, JIRA Service Management and Confluence to the organization Act as a subject matter expert on JIRA, providing guidance and hands-on support      to teams and users during the adoption of JIRA Service Management, and the      continuing use of JIRA Investigate, use and advocate for industry-standard and best practices Communicate and share knowledge with stakeholders and contacts at all levels Maintain relevant technical documentation   Required skills & experience Degree in Management Information Systems, Computer Science or related discipline 4+ years experience as JIRA Administrator with experience customizing JIRA      projects with various schemes, complex workflows, screen schemes,      permission schemes, and notification schemes Minimum  of 3-5 years hands-on experience working with the Atlassian product      suite, with expert level knowledge of Confluence and JSM Completion of at least 1 full migration in to JIRA Service Management and experience      in performing Atlassian and plug-in installations Ability to write custom JQL (JIRA Query Language) Understanding of industry best practices for using JIRA and JIRA Service Management Familiar  with Agile project management methodologies and SDLC principles Must  have strong work ethic with good time management skills Business analysis experience, is desirable Ability to work in a dynamic environment with challenging deadlines and      fast-changing requirements Can build and maintain good working relationships with technical and business stakeholders Have excellent analytical and problem-solving      skills  Excellent English verbal and written communication skills

column2: To support this, NXP-IT formed a Cloud Center of Excellence (Cloud CoE) reporting directly into the CIO. The Cloud CoE s goal is to enable accelerated and sustainable adoption of cloud across the enterprise (both business and IT) - maximizing the ability to realize its benefits while reducing risk. This team is recognized as the industry leading Cloud Center of Excellence for the high-tech industry.         The Cloud CoE is responsible for defining Strategy and policy for cloud computing, driving, and implementing cloud services and platforms, running proof of concepts, piloting emerging cloud technologies (eg GenAI, Machine Learning) and supporting business-initiatives in adapting cloud technologies (including the organizational change).         As Cloud Operations Manager you are challenged to collaborate closely with our business partners and IT-service provider, to continuously optimize our operational performance while supporting the agile way of working.                 Your Responsibilities              Driving relentless improvements on Cloud CoE services ( eg security , availability, performance)             Communicate with stakeholders, eliminate/escalate impediments, help manage risk,          Identifying potential problems and points of friction and working to find solutions in order to maximize efficiency and      effectiveness             Manage the Cloud service providers from operational / tactical perspective             aspect like delivery, finance, compliancy, SoX             Reporting on the Cloud (data) platform services to the business stakeholders              Organises processes and WoW with Cloud consumers and TCS with respect to services             Find the right balance between SAFe and agile ITIL          Facilitate and improves way of working between Cloud CoE and its partners         Coordinating different teams to foster exchange of ideas and provide cross-team learning opportunities              Active member of the NXP-IT Service management team         Be evangelist of Cloud computing and its way of working to the rest of NXP             Our team           The Cloud CoE is a team of dedicated and passionate IT professionals. The team is located both in Eindhoven, The Netherlands), and in Bangalore, India.                       ?         Your profile                 Graduated from University or having equal professional experience         Proven track-record as Operational manager managing complex IT landscape in global enterprises         Have worked in High Tech industry or R&D environments         Proven track-record in agile ITIL          Understand business requirements and be able to translate these in operational value based KPI s       Have experience in managing external IT service provider       You can build and bond team of multi-disciplinary competence reporting into different organization         Knowledge of the DevOps culture and principles.                 Furthermore you:             Have strong teamwork and communication skills.         Are organized, efficient, and results-driven         Have a technical background, be creative, analytical, open-minded and transparent on own work         Are eager to learn and not afraid to take initiative. You know how to learn from failure         Have great English communication skills, both verbally as in writing                 What's in it for you             An energetic team that aims to be a front-runner in enabling Cloud Services         A challenging environment which stimulates you to continuously develop yourself as an individual with coaching, experiments and room for failure         Be an ambassador for cloud and DevOps way of working         Intensive collaboration opportunities with a broad range of IT and business teams         A self-organizing team with flexibility in working hours and location         a dynamic and informal workplace, with an environment that promotes excellence, transparency, integrity and respect.         A global high-tech company that carries innovation in its DNA

column2: At WorkCtrl.Tech, were changing the office experience. Were a truly agile and product-based company.     Department: Technology Vertical: Information & Cyber Security Designation: Information & Cybersecurity Intern Duration: 3-6 months Job Description:  Position Overview:  We are seeking a highly motivated Information & Cybersecurity Intern to join our team and gain practical experience in the field of cybersecurity. This internship offers an excellent opportunity to learn from experienced professionals and contribute to projects that are critical to our organization's security posture.  Key Responsibilities: 1.  Assist with Security Monitoring: Monitor and analyse security logs and alerts to identify potential threats and vulnerabilities within the organization's network and systems. 2.  Support Incident Response: Assist in incident response activities, including analysis of security incidents, documentation, and participation in post-incident reviews. 3.  Security Awareness Training: Contribute to developing and delivering security awareness training materials to educate employees on best practices for safeguarding company information. 4.  Vulnerability Management: Assist in vulnerability scanning, assessment, and remediation efforts to ensure the organization's systems are up-to-date and secure. 5.  Participate in Security Projects: Contribute to ongoing security projects, such as implementing security controls, conducting risk assessments, and researching emerging cybersecurity trends. 6.  Documentation and Reporting: Help in maintaining security documentation, compiling reports on security metrics, and supporting compliance-related activities. Qualifications: Currently pursuing a degree in Information Security, Cybersecurity, Computer Science, or related field. Understanding of fundamental concepts in cybersecurity, such as network security, cryptography, and secure software development. Familiarity with security tools and technologies, such as SIEM, IDS/IPS, vulnerability scanners, and endpoint protection solutions. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Ability to work well in a team and collaborate effectively with colleagues from diverse technical backgrounds. A passion for cybersecurity and a willingness to learn and adapt in a dynamic environment. Benefits of the Internship: Hands-on experience in a professional cybersecurity environment. Exposure to a wide range of security technologies and practices. Mentorship and guidance from experienced cybersecurity professionals. Opportunity to contribute to real-world cybersecurity initiatives and projects. Potential for long-term career growth and development within the organization. Join us in our mission to protect and secure our organization's information assets while gaining invaluable experience in the ever-evolving field of cybersecurity.

column2: About Position: We are seeking passionate and innovative Generative AI Technology team to join our organization. As a Principal Architect in Gen AI technology, you will work at the intersection of technology and industry knowledge, leveraging your expertise in generative AI tools to push the boundaries for building innovative solutions. As a Generative AI Technologist, you will play a crucial role in shaping and building the future of building solutions across business functions, industry domains and finding unique ways to bend emerging technologies. We are looking for Principal Architect to develop high-impact, high-visibility large language-based solutions & improve the experience of millions of customers. If you're creative & passionate about solving real world conversational AI problems, come join us. Role: Chief Architect  GenAI / Principal Architect  GenAI Locations: All PSL Locations Experience: 15 Years & above Job Type: Full Time Employment What You'll Do: Strategic Vision: Define and oversee the AI/ML/GenAI technical direction and architectural vision, ensuring alignment with strategic goals and digital transformation efforts. Solution Design: Key contributor in Collaborate with clients and internal teams to understand business requirements, challenges, and opportunities. Design scalable and efficient AI/ML/GenAI solutions considering deployment models and integration with existing tools that align with client needs and strategic goals. Architecture Development: Develop high-level and detailed solution architectures for AI/ML/GenAI projects by consider factors such as choice of Hyperscale partners like Azure, AWS, GCP & Data integration, Models, MLOPs, LLMOps, Scalability, Security, Performance optimization focusing on operational capabilities. Develop and implement applications demonstrating sophisticated Generative AI models such as OpenAI GPT, Anthropic Clude, Google Plam2, Meta Llama2, focusing on enhancing developer and business productivity. Technical Expertise: Serve as the subject matter expert on AI technologies, by applying frameworks such as LangChain and Llama Index for efficient indexing, retrieval, and chaining of language models, enhancing the contextual understanding and response generation of applications. Pre-Sales Support: Assist the sales team in pre-sales activities by providing technical expertise, participating in client meetings, and contributing to proposal development. Translate client requirements into feasible Gen AI solutions. Collaboration: Collaborate with Enterprise, Application, Data, & DevOps Architects. Work closely with CTO, Data scientists, Prompt engineers and other stakeholders to ensure the successful implementation of Gen AI solutions. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to address technical challenges and drive project success. Proof of Concept (PoC): Lead the development of GenAI PoCs to demonstrate the feasibility and potential value of proposed solutions. Present PoC results to clients and gather feedback for iterative improvement. Best Practices: Establish and promote best practices, design patterns, and coding standards for GenAI solution development. Audit AI tools and practices across data, models and software engineering. Ensure that solutions are maintainable, extensible, and well-documented. Risk Management: Work closely with security and risk leaders to foresee and mitigate risks, ensuring ethical AI implementation and compliance with upcoming regulations. Client Communication: Communicate technical concepts and solutions effectively to non-technical stakeholders, including clients and executives. Address client concerns and provide clear explanations of complex technical concepts. Project Oversight: Provide technical oversight throughout the project lifecycle, from initial design to deployment and post-implementation support. Monitor project progress and make necessary adjustments to ensure successful delivery. Continuous Learning: Stay current with industry trends and emerging AI technologies. Participate in workshops, conferences, and training sessions to enhance your own expertise and contribute to the growth of the team. Expertise You'll Bring: Bachelor's Degree in any of Computer Science, Statistics, Data Science or a related field with 15+ years of experience with application architecture analysis, design, and delivery. 5+ years of experience in machine learning model development, natural language processing, and data analysis; Experienced in Supervised and Unsupervised learning, feature engineering, model training, and deployment. Use ML and Generative AI tools and other technologies to design, evangelize, and implement state-of-the-art solutions for never-before-solved problems. Define and implement best practices for building, testing, and deploying scalable AI solutions, with a focus on generative models and LLM. Drive successful business outcomes for educating, training, designing and building cloud hosted Generative AI solutions. Familiarity with architecture large-scale data processing and modeling Interact with customers directly to understand the business problem, help and aid them in implementation of their ML ecosystem. Ability to travel 25%, on average, based on the work you do and the clients and industries/sectors you serve. Strong collaborative and interpersonal skills, specifically a proven ability to effectively guide and influence within a dynamic matrix environment. Excellent problem-solving abilities and the ability to work independently or collaboratively in a team. Benefits: Competitive salary and benefits package Culture focused on talent development with quarterly promotion cycles and company-sponsored higher education and certifications Opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies Employee engagement initiatives such as project parties, flexible work hours, and Long Service awards Annual health check-ups Insurance coverage: group term life, personal accident, and Mediclaim hospitalization for self, spouse, two children, and parents Our company fosters a values-driven and people-centric work environment that enables our employees to: Accelerate growth, both professionally and personally Impact the world in powerful, positive ways, using the latest technologies. Enjoy collaborative innovation, with diversity and work-life wellbeing at the core. Unlock global opportunities to work and learn with the industry's best. Let's unleash your full potential at Persistent  Persistent is an Equal Opportunity Employer and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any kind.

The ideal candidate will have a strong background in designing, developing, and deploying scalable cloud-based applications and services. Required Skills: Design and Development: Architect, design, and implement robust, scalable, and secure cloud-based applications and services. Deployment and Maintenance: Develop and maintain deployment pipelines, ensuring reliable and efficient delivery of software updates. Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, developers, and operations, to deliver high-quality software solutions. Optimization: Identify and implement performance improvements to ensure the scalability and efficiency of cloud applications. Security: Ensure the security and compliance of cloud-based applications by implementing best practices and conducting regular security assessments. Troubleshooting: Diagnose and resolve technical issues related to cloud infrastructure and applications. Experience with containerization technologies like Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernetes. Familiarity with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform or CloudFormation. Skills: Solid understanding of cloud architecture and services. Proficiency in CI/CD tools and processes. Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Strong communication and collaboration skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Knowledge of security best practices in cloud environments. Preferred Qualifications: Experience with serverless architecture and services.  Knowledge of database management systems (SQL and NoSQL). Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools. Certifications in cloud technologies (e.g., AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect). Engagement Type: Payout will be managed by Uplers Job Type: 6 Months contract Location: Remote The number of working days, the talents will work, gets paid accordingly No Leave Policy How to apply for this opportunity? Register/Login:  Register or login on our portal Apply:  Click 'Apply,' upload your resume and fill in the required details. Submit Application:  Click 'Directly Apply Now' to submit your application. Matchmaking & Interview:  Get matched and crack a quick interview with our hiring partner. The company is headquartered in Alphen aan den Rijn, Netherlands and Philadelphia, United States. Wolters Kluwer in its current form was founded in 1987 with a merger between Kluwer Publishers and Wolters Samsom.   About Uplers: Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. column2: The IT Infrastructure and Operations Specialist is part of Global IT Operations and is responsible for effective provisioning, installation/configuration, operation, and maintenance of Clients Azure and Microsoft 365 infrastructure. Requirements  Bachelor?? Degree in Computer Science preferred or equivalent relevant work experience and hardware/software certification(s). 10-12 years of overall IT experience of which 5-6 years is Azure Cloud and M365. Thorough understanding of change management and version control. Relevant Microsoft Azure certifications (eg. Azure Administrator Associate and Azure Solutions Architect Expert). Relevant Microsoft 365 certifications (eg. Modern Desktop Administrator Associat and Security Administrator Associate). Experience working with monitoring platforms (OpManager, SCOM etc.). Experience working with network technologies, applications, and infrastructure. Experience working with Microsoft applications and infrastructure. Understanding of hypervisors (Hyper-V and VMware). Structured in everyday life and possess great multitasking skills. Experience with GMP and the associated technical documentation. Provide technical support and solutions related to implementation, configuration, and maintenance of Windows servers in Azure. Install, configure, administer, and support Azure compute instances, backups, storage, networking. Knowledge of Azure resources and management: subscriptions, resource groups, VMs, storage accounts, load balancers, app gateway, vNets, subnets, private endpoints, DNS, recovery services vaults. Perform regular updates and backup operations for data protection and recovery. Performing installation setup, deployments, testing, and validation related to deployments. Planning and assisting with migrations from on-premises systems to Microsoft 365 services, applications, identity, and device management solutions. Maintenance of Microsoft 365 tenant configuration settings, such as domain name settings, federation, and external access. Configuring and deploying Intune policies and profiles for mobile devices and applications. Staying up-to-date with the latest Microsoft 365 features, updates, and security best practices.

Company Name  : TechnePlus Software India Pvt Ltd  Company website  :  https://techneplus.com/ Profile:  Oracle Commerce Cloud Consultant (OCC) Location:  Bangalore (WFO) Requirement: Experience - 4 to 8 Years We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Oracle Commerce Cloud (OCC) Consultant with a strong background in HTML, CSS, and UI/UX design to join our dynamic e-commerce team. This role involves working closely with our e-commerce, marketing, and IT teams to design, develop, and enhance our online shopping platform, ensuring a seamless, engaging, and visually appealing experience for our users. Responsibilities: Design and implement innovative UI/UX solutions on the Oracle Commerce Cloud platform, focusing on enhancing user engagement and satisfaction. column1: Head of Information Technology and Solutions, India & Bangladesh
column2: Role & responsibilities:   This is a management position with functional reporting to head office and administrative reporting to the Chief Executive Officer, AKES, India. The employee shall be based in Mumbai, India and shall perform duties and responsibilities defined below, and such other duties and obligations as may be identified to the employee by AKES, India from time to time.    IT Operational Planning Plan for improved IT infrastructure, operations, information security, data analytics, implementation of approved systems, and all matters concerning IT. Oversee IT planning and budgeting exercise. Oversee development and implementation of ICT policies, procedures and best practices. Oversee IT projects and operations. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, manage project lifecycles, and ensure successful project outcomes.   Technology Infrastructure and Information Security Drive the design, implementation, and continuous improvement of technology infrastructure for offices and schools in the region, including computer networks, telephony, computer labs, computing devices, education technology, teaching and learning equipment, security and surveillance systems, etc. Develop and execute information security strategy. Ensure implementation of cyber security measures and industry standards to protect technology infrastructure, systems and data.  Oversee administration, maintenance, utilization and up-to-date documentation of technology infrastructure. Oversee compliance with statutory regulations like data protection regulations from ICT perspective. Software Solutions, Information Systems and Data Analytics Lead initiatives to identify and evaluate emerging technologies and make recommendations to improve systems and processes. Oversee the acquisition, development, implementation and maintenance of an EMIS and other auxiliary information systems (HR, Student Management, Financials, etc.). Utilize design principles and collaborate with AKS service companies to align policies and procedures and lower the total lifecycle cost of the information system.  Drive the utilization of technology and software-based innovative solutions to automate business processes and workflows. Education Technology Integration Oversee the development and maintenance of a robust technical infrastructure that supports the seamless use of technology in education. Collaborate with educators and instructional designers to integrate innovative technology solutions into the curriculum and learning experiences. Evaluate, select, and implement appropriate EdTech tools, platforms, and resources to enhance teaching and learning. Lead research efforts to explore and pilot new educational technologies that can revolutionize teaching and learning. Ensure reliable technical support for faculty, students, and staff to troubleshoot and resolve EdTech-related issues. Foster partnerships with EdTech vendors, startups, and industry experts to bring cutting-edge solutions to the institution.   IT Service Desk Oversee all IT service desk activities at regional level. Respond to escalated IT service requests. Interact with schools/units on all levels to help resolve IT related issues and provide answers and solutions in a timely manner. IT Asset Management Build and maintain relationships with all stakeholders and IT vendors. Oversee contracts and procurement of appropriate and approved hardware, software and other IT products. Oversee the purchasing of all approved software, hardware and other ICT supplies at the regional level. Ensure all organizational IT assets are maintained responsibly. Prepare effective SLAs, RFQ and RFP based on organization requirements.   Monitoring and Evaluation (M&E) and Impact Analysis: Create a framework for M&E to assess the impact on target communities. Review quality of data, collection methods, business processes and impact evaluation.  Identify additional key indicators to support the M&E process for the local context. Reporting: Track and monitor portfolio performance against set strategic and annual targets. Highlight trends/red flags. Support quarterly, annual and ad-hoc report requests. Collaborate with other functions to produce reports needed for policy, planning and decision making. Management: Initiate and implement improvements in all areas of IT responsibility. Serve as main point of contact on all IT related matters for the AKS operations in India and Bangladesh. Manage, guide, appraise and coach IT team members. Preferred candidate profile: Masters degree in computer science, information technology, information management, or a related field.  Overall 12+ years of IT experience, with 35 years of proven experience of managing IT function and teams. Extensive technical knowledge and vast experience ofin managing technology infrastructure, large-scale academic and enterprise information systems and software solutions. Exposure to data analytics tools is preferred. Excellent planning, organizational, and management skills. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Effective technical writing, communication, and presentation skills in English. Ability to build effective working relationships across teams. Willingness to travel for work, as needed.  Interested candidates can share their resumes on pooja.kinnerkar@akesi.org
column11: education technology, IT Operational Planning, Software Services, IT Service Desk, IT Operations Management, Data Center Management, IT Infrastructure Management, Information Technology, software solution

Work cross-functionally with Customer Success, Professional Services, Engineering, and Product teams to deliver customer  on-boarding  and provide inputs into onboarding process improvement.? column2: GeekyAnts is seeking an experienced and dynamic Information Security Officer (ISO) to lead our information security program. The ISO will be responsible for developing and implementing a comprehensive information security strategy, ensuring our organization's data and systems remain secure and compliant with regulatory standards. This role will report directly to the Chief Information Officer (CIO) and will work closely with IT, legal, and executive teams. Key Responsibilities Security Strategy Development: Develop and implement the organization's information security strategy, ensuring alignment with business objectives and compliance requirements. Risk Assessment: Lead regular risk assessments to identify vulnerabilities, recommend mitigation strategies, and establish appropriate risk management policies. Policy Management: Develop, maintain, and enforce information security policies, standards, and guidelines. Security Awareness: Implement and oversee an organization-wide security awareness program to foster a security-conscious culture. Incident Response: Develop and manage the organization's incident response plan, leading investigations and post-mortem reviews of security breaches and incidents. Access Management: Oversee identity and access management, ensuring appropriate controls for user access to systems and data. Compliance: Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements (e.g., GDPR, CCPA, HIPAA) and industry standards (e.g., ISO 27001, NIST). Third-Party Management: Collaborate with the procurement team to conduct security assessments of third-party vendors and partners. Team Leadership: Build and lead a security team, providing guidance, training, and development opportunities. Monitoring and Reporting: Implement continuous monitoring systems to detect security anomalies and produce regular security reports for senior management. Requirements: 7+ years of progressive experience in information security roles, with at least 3 years in a leadership capacity. Certifications: CISSP, CISM, CISA, or similar professional security certifications are strongly preferred. Technical Skills: Strong understanding of network security, encryption, threat management, and vulnerability assessment. Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to convey complex security concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Analytical Skills: Demonstrated ability to analyze complex data and develop actionable security solutions. Problem-Solving: Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to manage multiple priorities under pressure. Educational Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. A Master's degree or equivalent is preferred.
column11: Network Audit, Network Setup and Configuration, Monitoring and Maintenance, Security Configuration, Wifi, Policy Maintenance, and Security Group Management, Collaboration, Technical Support, Data Privacy and Protection

You will also be responsible for managing and maintaining the infrastructure and applications that support these solutions, including Azure Active Directory, Azure Information Protection, and Microsoft Intune.
